about.subtitle: About us
about.title: We are BTE Germany.
about.text: The Build the Earth Germany mission is to recreate the entire German territory on a scale of 1:1 in the computer game Minecraft. Minecraft is the world's best-selling video game, with over 200 billion sales, and works much like a Lego box - but with an infinite number of bricks and an infinite amount of space. Build the Earth Germany is part of the Build the Earth project, which is active worldwide. With over 1000 people actively involved, BTE Germany is the second largest building team internationally.
